[File: aptos-core/storage/storage-interface/src/state_store/state_with_summary.rs] [Struct: StateWithSummary] [Version arithmetic] Does the Version type (u64) handle edge cases like MAX_VERSION correctly, or can overflow cause version wraparound attacks? (Medium)
